summary: The diff implements most of the requested requirements. New screens (ProPitchScreen, ProStatsScreen, ProShareScreen, ProNetworkScreen) are created, Screen union type is updated, App.tsx cases are added, price is updated to 29.90 CHF, and most entry points/features are added. However, several specific details are missing or deviate from the spec, particularly around badge system (REQ-217), PROS_DEMO data updates, Express Services (REQ-219), exact copy text matching specs, and some fine-grained AC items.

missing_requirements.requirement: REQ-209: Testimonial quotes must match spec exactly in English: Sophie R. 'My revenue doubled in 3 months', Karim B. 'I work 100% on my own terms now', Marc T. 'Best investment I made for my practice'. The diff shows different French quotes. Marc T.'s city should be Zurich not Berne, and star ratings (4.9, 5.0, 4.8) are all shown as 5.

REQ-209: Value pillar titles and descriptions must match spec exactly: 'Freedom' / 'Work where you want, when you want, at your price'; 'Revenue' / 'Keep 85% of every booking — no hidden fees'; 'Network' / 'Join 500+ independent pros already on NEXUS'. The diff uses French text and different descriptions.
REQ-209: Hero headline must be 'The platform that sets you free' and subheadline 'No boss. No commission. Just your clients.' The diff does not show these English strings.
REQ-209: CTA subtext must read 'TWINT only · 29.90 CHF/month after trial'. The screen appears to be in French throughout, not matching the specified English string.
REQ-209: Satisfaction guarantee row must show IconShield #00D97A + '30-day money-back guarantee' — not confirmed in truncated diff.
REQ-208: SubscriptionModal subtitle must show 'Then 29.90 CHF / month'. The diff shows 'Puis 29.90 CHF / mois' in French — not the exact specified English string.
REQ-208: TabPaiement financial summary line must read 'Monthly subscription cost: 29.90 CHF'. The diff shows 'Abonnement mensuel: 29.90 CHF / mois' in French — not the exact specified string.

REQ-211: Revenue bar chart demo values must use English service names: 'Haircut 420 CHF, Beard trim 180 CHF, Hair+Beard 315 CHF, Shave 100 CHF, Kids cut 80 CHF, Other 60 CHF'. The diff uses French labels.
REQ-211: Conversion rate card label must be 'Profile views → Bookings' uppercase. The diff shows 'Taux de conversion' in French.
REQ-211: Rating trend demo values must be exactly [4.6, 4.7, 4.7, 4.8, 4.8, 4.9] (6 points). The diff uses 10 values.

REQ-215: Network list demo pros must match spec: 'Marie L. · Coiffure · Lausanne', 'Sofiane R. · Barber · Geneva', 'Emma D. · Esthetique · Berne'. The diff shows 'Barbier' instead of 'Barber' and 'Geneve' instead of 'Geneva'.
REQ-215: Referral code card title must be 'My referral code'. The diff uses French 'Mon code de parrainage'.

getBadges() utility function must be defined in ExplorerScreen.tsx and badge pills must render on 'Available now' cards (bottom-left overlay) and inline in 'Experts for you' rows. No evidence of ExplorerScreen.tsx modification in the diff.
Badges must render in FicheProScreen below pro name above slogan. No evidence of FicheProScreen.tsx modification in the diff.
PROS_DEMO data must have isNew flag and nbAvis fields to support badge logic for Alexandre, Elise, Nadia, Karim, Marco, Clara. No evidence of PROS_DEMO updates in the diff.
ProDashboardScreen must have a 'Boost my visibility' glass-card with 3 tier rows (Standard/Premium/Flash 24h) below the Flash toggle card. Not confirmed in the truncated ProDashboardScreen diff.
ExplorerScreen must show animated 'BOOST' badge overlay at top-right corner of cards for pros with flash===true AND note>=4.8 (Alexandre, Karim). No evidence of ExplorerScreen.tsx modification.

'Express Services' section must be added to ExplorerScreen above 'Available now', with horizontal scroll compact cards 140x180px, pulsing gold border animation when locationActive, Haversine distance sorting, and section hidden for non-flash filters. No evidence of ExplorerScreen.tsx modification in the diff.

'Why NEXUS Pro — discover all features' link must appear below the metric cards in ProDashboardScreen with Inter 500 13px #F2D06B and IconArrowRight size 14. Not confirmed in the truncated ProDashboardScreen diff.
'View my stats' link must be placed specifically in the Next appointment card footer area in ProDashboardScreen. Not confirmed from the truncated diff.
ProBusinessScreen must show 'Share my profile' button on tabs 1 and 2 only (not all tabs). The diff shows SharePill component but it is unclear if it is tab-conditional.

hallucinated_features.description: ProStatsScreen conversion rate card shows a '+3% ce mois' delta indicator which was not specified in the requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-211 only specifies the label 'Profile views → Bookings', value '24%', and subtitle 'Based on last 30 days' — no delta/trend indicator was requested.

hallucinated_features.description: ProShareScreen uses a clipboard copy SVG icon instead of the specified IconCheck for the 'Copy link' share option.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-213 explicitly specifies IconCheck #F2D06B for the Copy link option.

hallucinated_features.description: SubscriptionModal back button navigates to 'pro_pitch' — this navigation change was not specified in the requirements for SubscriptionModal.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement specifies changing the SubscriptionModal back button destination to 'pro_pitch'.
